title: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The SaveAs feature is not retaining the file type and the file icon has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g. move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog box will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the file name without including the extension (as it is not requested).
7) Click Ok.
Observed Behavior:
The file is successfully added to the specified location in the Navigator, but it does not display any file extension.
